node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `e2poll` ( `e2poll_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `is_dailypoll` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `e2poll_results` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `totalvotes` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `poll_author` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `was_dailypoll` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `poll_status` enum('new','current','open','closed') COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'new', `multiple` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `question` char(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`e2poll_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
node.title: e2poll
